abstract: The home builder Levitt & Sons received approval to tap a $3.5 million loan to finish building homes across the Southeast.
snippet: The home builder Levitt & Sons received approval to tap a $3.5 million loan to finish building homes across the Southeast.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON (Dow Jones/AP)  The home builder Levitt & Sons received approval on Monday to tap a $3.5 million loan to finish building homes across the Southeast.
